summary: "Pride & Prejudice" is a 2005 movie directed by Joe Wright, based on Jane Austen's novel. It tells the story of five sisters in an English family who navigate love, marriage, and misunderstandings. Keira Knightley plays Elizabeth Bennet, and Matthew Macfadyen plays Mr. Darcy, who falls for her. The film stays true to the book but adds new family dynamics. Shot in England, it blends traditional and modern filmmaking styles. Released in the UK and US, it was a box office hit, earning $121.6 million. Critics loved it, especially Knightley's performance, earning her an Academy Award nomination.
title: Pride & Prejudice (2005 film)
